channel.title: Botting - Should I?
channel.description:
I botted quite a bit before the bot nuke, once the bot nuke hit, rsbots.net became banned, and so did rsbuddy or whatever it was called. I haven't even looked for bot sites since the nuke, i've been hearing rumors of a bot nuke again for about 4 months now, and nothing. Im honestly to the point i really would like to bot again.
My question is which bot site should I use, and are they decent? At the moment im wanting to finish mining, its something i've botted in the past at LRC, and would like to continue, im just somewhat skeptical, not about getting banned, well somewhat, but about the bots working decently.

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889

@ciaran6889 wrote:

whats your rsn so i can report you

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

But those are easy skills to get. Why not take a real challenge and grind on a difficult skill?

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:11, topic:451638”]No one can dictate to you how to play RuneScape. You have two options laid before you, choose one.

Although, I must ask, if you’re not having fun playing, why are you?[/quote]

Well, as I thought I had said above. I do enjoy playing RuneScape, there are skills I really enjoy training, even after 99. There are very few I dont, one being mining. As I also thought I said above, I have botted mining once before, before the nuke. I just thought since I started botting it to 99, i’d finish. No I will not take pride in the skill being 99 as I do the others that I did legitimentally, such as smithing/herb/prayer etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Armend555 Armend555
item.description:
@Armend555 wrote:

powerbot.org

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:13, topic:451638”]If you bot you won’t appreciate the account.[/quote]I fully agree with this

I should point out, just do what you feel like. There isn’t a day that passes that I no life a specific skills. Heck woodcut when I was a nooblet took me like four years to get. Never cut one piece of ivy.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:9, topic:451638”]To answer your question the only good bot out is powerbot.org. But if u going to bot dont do a skill everyone does[/quote]the PRO bots on epicbot are actually decent. Only ones I’ve used are the agility/hunter though so I can’t vouch for others. The hunter has some issues with sallys but it’s all being worked out.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

To answer your question the only good bot out is powerbot.org. But if u going to bot dont do a skill everyone does

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:4, topic:451638”][quote author=Spades link=topic=554526.msg4061392#msg4061392 date=1343453409]
Don’t bot… What the is the point in playing a game if you aren’t playing it. Don’t give me the “I have a life” thing, if you don’t have time to train the stats don’t play the game.
[/quote]

You’re exactly right. I enjoy various things on scape, but the skills I dont enjoy I sort of want to bot, mostly just mining.[/quote]You could skip this skill until September comes when we will have an action bar. I find it very useful for power mining.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Loveandpower:

There will always be bots. I don’t personally support botting but I even bot hunter ( not chins ) I do it 100% for experience cause I just cba to do it.

Years ago, I wanted to get 99 fletching(back in 07ish) but I didn’t have the money to lose to get the cape. So I cut down 1k yew tree’s and I picked 1k flax. I spun the flax, cut the logs, and made the bows. I repeated. I made enough from it that I could re-buy the supplies, except for the bow string, so I had to buy flax. I spun ~35k flax for 99 fletching. It took me a few weeks to get the 99 but it was well worth it, and I am still proud of that cape.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

There will always be bots. I don’t personally support botting but I even bot hunter ( not chins ) I do it 100% for experience cause I just cba to do it.

item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Then just don´t do mining, and if you really want that 99 mining cape you should just go through it and you will have a nice achievement feeling. Instead of, oh just another 99.

item.title: Botting - Should I?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Spades:

Don’t bot… What the is the point in playing a game if you aren’t playing it. Don’t give me the “I have a life” thing, if you don’t have time to train the stats don’t play the game.

You’re exactly right. I enjoy various things on scape, but the skills I dont enjoy I sort of want to bot, mostly just mining. I’ve botted in the past, not hardcore, just mining here and there, and agaility once or twice. This past year i’ve had a life and haven’t been on scape like much at all, but thats not my reason to bot, i’d just like try it again and get 99 mining or something, but as i’ve said, i haven’t even looked at bot sites to try to find anything since the nuke, but I sort of want to test it out again, just on mining mostly, but who knows, i’ll probably end up changing my mind, not sure yet.

Read full topic
